title: Ticket #6801: 64-bit Windows builds generate (nearly) empty core files
description: Most of the 64-bit implementation of the Windows ExceptionHandler class, which is used to generate register dumps and stack traces when a program crashes is missing. Currently, the only thing printed in the "core" file for Win64 is the name of the exception.
check_ins: 2018-Oct-17 12:52   Check-in [55580]: fix for #6801, Win64 implementation of ExceptionHandler class (used to make core files) was mostly missing. ===VersionHistory:Complete=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
